text: My naznachili etot dom v sborishche i ubezhishche lyudyam: derzhite dlya sebya mesto Avraamovo mol'bishchem. My zapovedali Avraamu i Ismailu: "Oba vy vnushite, chtoby dom Moy blagogoveyno chtili sovershayushchiye vokrug yego obkhody, provodyashchiye v nom vremya v blagochestivykh dumakh, preklanyayushchiyesya i poklanyayushchiyesya do zemli
